channel.title: When is the next update/patch?
channel.description:
Hi, again really nice job on the game guys.
Please can we get some sort of date (exact would be great) of when the new patch or update release will be rolling out?
Maybe a preview of what fixes and additions we might see would be amazing too.
Thanks!

item.title: When is the next update/patch?
item.dc:creator: OnboardError
item.description:
We are working on it now… see the “bug forum” to view some of the bugs posted to get an idea of the stuff we plan to address.

Read full topic
